Mike

author: Dorian Kachur
text:
I am looking for some creative ways to demonstrate to taxpayers and/or Council that they are receivng good value for their tax dollar.
Does anyone have any effective slides or brochures or presentation approaches that were well received?
Thanks.
title: Demonstrating value
